content.detailedDescription:
The evening of the 4th, we had shot fireworks at the farm.  west/south of brookfield missouri about 4 miles. it was about 10:30 pm.  my son, my fiance's son were standing out behind the house.  looking at all the stars.  being from kansas city we didn't get a chance to see the night sky in the country much.  

as we were looking up we noticed a "star" moving from west to east.  we at first thought a satellite but it was moving way too fast.  no other lights, too high for a plane.  the object blended with the stars, it looked just like a star.  it took about 10 minutes to go from the west to far east out of sight in a straight line.

not sure what it was.  definitely didn't think it was a plane because of the speed and seemingly high altitude.  it seemed to me and airplane that would move that fast would have to be lower, therefore we'd see different lights.
content.summary: Looked like a star going west to east, straight line, blended in with stars.  moved very fast

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On july 15th around 6pm i took my kids to the neighborhood pool to swim. sometime around 7:15 i happened to notice a small white ball approaching slowly andy northwest direction. i didn't pay it much mind as it looked kind of like a balloon. however after a few minutes of playing in the pool with my kids i happened to notice that it was still in the same general area now moving through the clouds so i kept my eye on it for a moment and realized it looked unusual. i decided to get out of the pool and try and take a picture with my cell phone that i had in my backpack. i dried my face and hands and got my phone out of my backpack and tried to take a couple pictures. the sun was so bright that i couldn't tell if the pictures were coming out very well so i decided to videotape it with my cell phone. but again the sun on my screen made it difficult to see if i was capturing it or not since it was a white dot in the sky i filmed where i thought it was but couldn't tell if it was in focus or not so i decided to go home and try with my video camera. i got my video camera but the battery was nearly dead and only filmed for a few seconds. i didn't want to waste time trying to charge it so i decided to film with my cell phone again. the clouds that it was hovering around had moved on but it was still in the same place, my estimation is about 20-40 thousand feet high. for a moment i thought maybe it was a supernova or some event in space that was shining through the atmosphere since it was still daytime and very bright. i had to film it intermittently since i was feeding my kids dinner and trying to get them ready for bed. the first time i filmed it from home was at 8:03 p.M. and it was bigger and brighter as if it had descended a few thousand feet. the second time i filmed it was at 8:4pm and i noticed it had moved slightly to the north. i filmed it again  at 8:49 and the sun had se. i noticed it had moved even farther north about 90 degrees off the horizon now and almost directory above me. when i first saw it it was around 45 to 50 degrees off the horizon around 7:30 p.M. it was moving very slowly to the north while all of the stars and moon where moving west as they should. i came outside again at 9pm to film it and it was gone. around 8pm i called my brother and told him where to look in the sky to see it so i could get his opinion. he used his binoculars to view it and was silent for about a minute.  which gave me goosebumps. he then said, "wow, that is interesting". he then described it as "perfectly round and glassy looking". he said "i can see the side that's facing the sun is reflecting the light and the other side looks like glass... it looks like a christmas bulb". even through the binaculars he had no idea what it could be. he also told me that just about an hour earlier he was hiking on mt. diablo and saw something white and bright near the clouds by the top of the mountain and thought it might have been a super bright radio tower light but when he went further and looked for the source there was nothing there and no tower. he wondered if thus was the same thing that he saw. this could be possible since when i first saw the object it was coming from the direction of mt. diablo right about the time after he had finished his hike. note: in the video i say i saw it starting around 6pm, that is a mistake. i was thinking we had gone to the pool sometime after 6pm and didn't realize how long we were there before i first filmed it on y phone. i realized that i was saying the wrong time when i noticed the timestamp on my phone video. the duration was approximately from 7:15 p.M. to about 8:50 p.M.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: White dot moving through high clouds sometime after 6pm. noticed still there 7:30. got cell phone to video. filmed 4 times. 7:29, 8:03, 8:40, 8:49pm. moved about 10Â°, northbound in aprox 3hrs then was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out to the second floor terrace of my office building to smoke a cigarette when i first witnessed the object. it was to the east, beyond the trees in the office park next to my building. it looked as if it was at some distance. the object resembled a ball or star, white, almost glowing. it was in moving in an erratic pattern, like it was floating in tornado, around and around in the same place. it began to move to my right, and as it passed behind a tree i moved to bring it back into view. when i sighted it again, it began to eject smaller bright white objects. the smaller objects looked as if they were being dropped, like old footage of world war 2 bombers dropping bombs on japan. as they fell, they soon disappeared, as if they were evaporated or even translated. the large object dropped three objects with in the span of about 15 or 20 seconds. the original object then began to ascend up, like a balloon, as if it had gotten lighter. then it stopped its ascent, and waved as if it was a balloon on a tether swaying in the wind. then it descended a bit and hovered. i continued to look at it while it was hovering, completely still; no more erratic movements. i looked down to the floor for only about a second or two to stomp out my cigarette and when i looked back up the object was gone.

this all happened looking east from a second story balcony near junction of the 90 and the 405 in the fox hills neighborhood of culver city, ca, which only a couple miles north of lax. my coworkers and i frequently see planes landing at lax, and can hear the distant roar of the jet engines. police helicopters frequently fly over as well. this was not a helicopter or an aircraft i know of, and i've seen almost all of them. this incident took about 5 minutes or so, basically the amount of time it takes me to smoke a cigarette.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ball of light moves erratically then drops other objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv layed in the sofÃ¡, when my dog woke up and went to the window really quick, i got up think ing it was going to bark when a cilinder metÃ¡lic object started to enter through the window(30cm aprox object) making a sound like when you pass your finger from the top part of a glass cup, it stooped in the midle of the room and with a white-transparent beam started to scan up and down the air object,tv and mobile phone then in the same paralel line in wich it came in, it went slowly.I didnt see if it went to the sky or where, i was just still i couldnt move and my dog either through all of this(10-12mins) ,something of that object made us couldnt move despite i wanted.
sorry for my english, its bot very good.
content.summary: Cilinder metÃ¡lica object entered through my window and scanned some of my electrical objects in house

content.detailedDescription:
One night in the mid-70's i was visiting friends and decided to step outside for some air. i leaned up against my car and looking up toward the stars i immediately noticed a huge triangular black-out area. there was one seemingly small white light at each corner of the underside of this huge triangle. there was no sound or movement from this object and i believed it must be a ufo. it was very low to the ground (compared to its' size).

after viewing it for a few minutes i was getting a very eerie feeling and impression of danger. for me, this feeling was only akin to the time i was snorkeling in baja california and looked 20' below to see five large sharks -- i thought maybe i should get out of the water (and did so)! perceiving danger, i returned to my friend's house. i didn't mention anything to them and thinking back now i believe i was sort of "in shock".

this occurred in a suburban/rural area and there was a very small dairy across the road from my friend's house. perhaps that's why they were stationary there.?

i heard later, on the radio, that other people in escondido had reported sighting the object. this was definitely the weirdest experience of my life (so far anyway).
content.summary: Huge, silent, black, hovering triangle ship with one small white light at each corner of underside.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were walking along what is called the north wall on cleethorpes beach on the 7th july 2016 around 10.20pm. it was a clear dark night and was very quiet with most people in their houses asleep. as we were walking along my brother shouted "what is that?!" i turned and saw a yellowy-orange ball of light almost fireball-like in the sky approximately 30-40 feet high, shoot up and fly away for approximately 2 seconds then it disappeared immediately leaving nothing behind. it was very bright and moved fluenty.The ball of light had a trail almost like a shooting star but was too close to be a star. my first assumption was that it was a firework or a flare as it shot up into the sky as if it were propelled up into the sky, but i quickly disputed this claim as there were no fireworks before that sighting and none after, also there were no voices of people or any sighting of people in their gardens lighting anything or anything else going into the sky. i was very shocked as to what i had witnessed and i tried to come up with something that would explain but nothing came to mind. my brother told me he had witnessed something very similar before.
content.summary: A ball of light roughly the size of a basketball, shot up into sky and flew away disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Dark diamond shaped craft came from the north and went to the east. rotated on axis while hovering in the air. i was the only witness that day.It might of been a military aircraft because north west arkansas is a flight path
and the other day i saw several b2 bombers in the area.
content.summary: Black diamond shaped craft hovered over power lines then took off to the south

content.detailedDescription: Since first ufo sighting, i actively keep eyes on night sky. sometimes objects first look like stars, but something is off about them, so knowing my camera can photograph more clearly what my eyes cannot see, i took a photo. didn't know what i had captured until downloaded to computer. recent ancient aliens episode discussed black satellites from the 1950s, and this looked similar to the craft they showed. i'm always excited when i get a unique photo. if i recall correctly it flew away.
content.summary: Something made me want to get a photo of object

content.detailedDescription: It was the 3rd or 4th week in january 2015. 11:10pm saw a ? flying in a straight line from nw to se. one large piece with 8-10 smaller pieces on the left side all moving at the same rate of speed.Continued in se direction till out of sight. no nav lights no lights at all no jet sound at all. larger piece had orangish glow so did the smaller pieces.I think it might have been space junk. not a ufo. looked like it was following a straight line from atchitson,ks to srpingfield.Mo. there were no little gray men.
content.summary: One large piece 8-10 smallerpieces all had an orangish glow

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back from brighton, east sussex (for a friend's baby shower) back home to gloucestershire. after coming off the motorway at swindon, i took the a433 from cirencester towards tetbury to get to my home near dursley. i kept to the main road as my phone battery had died and i didn't want to get lost on the tiny back roads in the deep, dark cotswolds, surrounded by woods and fields. 

it had been a really hot day so i had my windows rolled all the way down and was enjoying the cool night breeze listening to the radio. i was relaxed but focused on driving, noting the only car on the road with me was keeping a steady distance of around half a mile behind me. i regularly checked my rear view mirror to check the two tiny points of its headlights were still there, and it gave me a sense of safety to know i wasn't completely alone so late at night (10pm-ish). 

the next time i checked my rear view mirror, i was surprised to see a large white circle, size of a football, glowing like a headlight, following directly behind my car. my first thought was that the car had caught me up very quickly indeed and i was confused how it had done that. but then i realised it must be a motorbike as there was only one headlight and motorbikes can zoom along faster than cars. however, i could hear no chugging or buzzing noise one would expect to hear from a motorbike engine at full pelt. i noted i was going 50+mph and this thing was keeping up with me. just as i turned my radio down to silence, my brain really confused, the light circle moved to overtake me on the right and i saw it come into view in my right side mirror. i looked at it several times whilst keeping an eye on the road ahead of me, wondering what manoeuvre it would make as it wasn't overtaking. and then it simply vanished. disappeared as quickly as it had appeared. 

i kept driving, utterly baffled. i noticed the other car a half mile behind me was still cruising along in the distance. i replayed what had happened in my mind over and over, trying to work out what i had just seen, but i could not come up with an explanation. after i while i understood i might have had a paranormal experience and i was thrilled, and felt very honoured. back home, i did a bit of research and was able to identify what i had seen was an orb of light. 

on reflection, i've wondered the reason this orb followed me. i think it was just checking me out. i didn't feel threatened or scared by its presence, maybe it was escorting me for a bit to make sure i was okay on my own... i don't know. lasting thoughts: it was awesome and i feel blessed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light orb followed my car along dark country road before overtaking and disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
While reviewing and editing town photos taken earlier in the evening, i noticed this object in the sky in the background. i didn't notice it at first in the original photo, it wasn't until i converted the image into a contour image that the object appeared. sure enough when i went back to look at the original photo, i noticed this little disc-shaped object in the sky above right. 
  what is particularly interesting to me is that: in order for this distant object to have showed up in the contour photo image (where light objects are reversed as black, and black objects are converted to light) indicates possibly some sort of magnetic field (dark matter?) may be surrounding the object. not sure.
i've included the original photo, a second enhanced photo, and the third contour-image photo for your review.
content.summary: This unidentified object appeared in the background of a photo i took last night.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a retired police officer. on july 20th, 2016, while riding my motorcycle down the indian nation turnpike in southern choctaw county in oklahoma, i noticed a long cylindrical object flying at relatively low altitude (approx. 500ft), in a south/southwest direction. at first, observation,the object was almost directly overhead, moving at a slow airspeed. it appeared to have no windows or outside structure and was very bright, almost chrome against the blue sky. for the purpose of my statement, the time was 1615hrs, weather was mostly sunny with temperatures near 100 degrees.
the object, continued on a straight line plan for another 3-4 miles, until it abruptly came to a hovering position. it remained there for approximately 30 seconds, before what is best described as a split-second flash of white light. at this time, the object no longer had a bright chrome appearance, but was dark in color as well as appeared to have either changed shape to either a smaller circular object, or i was simply viewing it from only one angle (front or rear).
after remaining in the hovering position for no more than 10-15 seconds, the object accelerated vertically at very high speed, until it was no longer visible.
at no time, did the object make any exhaust or condensation trail, nor could i make out any sound.
i did not stop to retrieve my cell phone from my bikes saddlebag, simply because i did not want to break visual eye contact. if i had tried to do so, i would have not witnessed the entire event.
having been around all types of aircraft during my career, i have never witnessed this level of advanced flying characteristic. the vertical speed was far beyond that of any aircraft i have seen. 
to note, there are no major airports in the area. there is however, a small county airport that houses only a few personal fixed wing aircraft and a med-flight helicopter. the nearest military installation is the mcalester army ordinance depot, which was 50-60 miles north of my location. to my knowledge, they house no aircraft.
the above statement is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge.
07-21-16
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unknown cylindrical, flying sw of hugo, ok at low altitude, stopped, flash of light, color and shape change, immediate vertical ascent at high speed until no longer visible

content.detailedDescription: I was on a flight from geneva to zurich and thought it was a pretty shot and took 3 shots back to back and when i went back to look at the final product, i noticed this in the second one...
content.summary: Taken by accident during flight between geneva and zurich

content.detailedDescription: Was observing in back yard with friend when my friend said look up. two large reddish disc's about have half the size of full moon moving fast towards the south crossed over each other twice and made large turn to left and plinked out. sky was clear with no clouds. i have been an a amature astronomer for almost 50 years. this was not astronomical. can sketch it if needed.
content.summary: Two large disc shape objects. moving s. crossed over each other banked left and plinked out.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving west on vietnam veteran's parkway in sumner county, just at the northern part of hendersonville, tn. at a little past two in the afternoon. tuesday, july 19, 2016. my husband is driving, talking on the phone with his brother and i see something above the roadway some distance ahead of us that is a pretty decent size and seems to be moving our way.  we were driving about 55 mph and as a second or two past i began to think this was one of those longish government drones or something.  i thought, "i am going to get to see one of these drones up close" because it was coming pretty low and over our lane, but it seemed to be moving a bit erratically in its flight path.  once it got within about 4 or 5 car lengths in front of us, i could see it clearly and saw no wings, no anything, just a smooth dull reddish brown color, hotdog shaped thing, four offset feet things, and the craft/creature was making a smooth swimming motion, like an eel. i noticed that it wasn't an even motion, like it was a live thing. it looked about 15 feet long and about 3 feet in diameter. i am so shocked that i finally holler "what the hell!".  my husband takes the phone from his ear and says what? what? i jerk myself around in the seat so i can see this thing out the back window, as it has just passed over the car. it has risen up in altitude, has turned off the roadway to the south, southeast, maybe 50 to 75 feet up and is entering a puffy cloud.  i could still clearly see the feet as it entered the cloud. it seemed to be gently entering the cloud and when it was about two thirds into the cloud, i quickly looked at the couple of cars behind us to see if any were swerving or anything, but didn't see any indication they saw too. i turned to my husband and said, "i think i just saw a ufo". then i said, "i think what i saw was a living creature". as soon as i got to a piece of paper i drew what i saw. i just want to know if anybody else has seen anything like this. i wish i hadn't seen this. i have been sick to my stomach ever since, knowing something like this is out there.
content.summary: A reddish brown tube shape, rounded on ends with the shape and proportions of a hotdog. about 15 or so feet long about three feet around with four, offset feet of angular shape. swimming through the air like an eel.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my early teenage years, enjoying a time of fun and fellowship with my family at my grandmother's house on what is known as tiptop or tomsauk mountain which is the highest pointin the state of mo. it was probably around 11 or 12 in the early afternoon, while my uncles and i were playing a game of basketball when my aunt called out to us to look. we all stopped playing to see what she was wanting us to see. there she was, pointing up at the sky where all of us saw it, a ufo. there it was, hovering up over us as if it was watching us guy's playing our game. all of a sudden my aunt bolted into the house and returned with a pair of binoculars and began looking at the object. soon all of us probably twelve to fifteen total was fighting over the binoculars to take our turn to look at it up close and personal. the craft looked like a bowl on top of another bowl, disc shaped. it had lights all around the center of it flashing red, yellow, green sequentially, you know, red, yellow, green all the way around it. through the binoculars you could see windows in the craft, antenas on it as well. the craft was just hovering there, not making a sound at all. i dont know how log it hovered above us exactly, probably somewhere around ten to fifteen minutes, and then at the snap of the finger, it was gone. as far as my feelings and actions over the event, speachless. all i can say is, it was the talk and the conversation for the rest of the day, none of us could believe what we had seen. i do not understand exactly, but these craft continued to be seen around our town for many months after by many people, not a few, but many. i guess the greatest spectacular viewing, was after a school basket ball game. i have no idea at how many people was standing in the school parking lot, gazing at the heavens watching these red glowing lights dancing around in the night sky putting on a display that words cannot explain. i'm talking about doing things that no human aircraft could ever do. shoot across the sky with no sound, stop, shoot backwards, stop, go straight up, stop, then shoot staight down and stop at its own free will with all ease. however, these craft were seen both during the day and at night.
content.summary: It was an event that i will remember until the day i die. seeing this object up close and personal.

content.detailedDescription:
Front yard drinking coffee
a light out of the the east moving very fast
thought it was a plane
silver ball moving very fast from east to west traveled the horizon in half the time a plane does with no noise flashing lights
wasn't a plane i do this every night and morning
flew east until i lost sight behind some trees
content.summary: Flashing light traveling west  to east  more than double a planes speed

content.detailedDescription: Very large triangle of star-like lights but a little brighter seen to the south, approx 40 degrees above horizon 11.10pm southend on sea, uk. the area between the lights appeared opaque/filled/black and no stars/atmosphere seen in that area. the 3 lights at the apparent corners moved east together, drifting slowly which is how it caught my eye (i may have took them for bright stars without the movement). the object was very large, i would estimate the size of a 747 at about 500ft away perhaps. i ran indoors to get camera after viewing it for approx 10 seconds, i returned within 5 seconds with my camera phone, but there was no sign of the object anywhere in the sky.
content.summary: Drifting triangle of star-like lights but little brighter, opaque inner

content.detailedDescription: One grassy lake il seen found ufos then in my back yard arlington heights filmed a ufo thats the video i am talking about .
content.summary: Well it was a big craft compared to the sun it from my view pretty large in diameter very  small but from the distance of the sun very large, it was truly amazing

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry - i asked my husband to send me his photos of the object we had witnessed om 7/9/16. by mistake he sent me photos of an object we saw on the night of 7/14/16. we believe this second object is actually a star because it is high in the sky every night in the same spot, but in a different location than the object we saw on 7/8 and 7/8/16

the incorrect photos that were included in my previous report are #2, #9, and i believe the third was #7.

i'm so sorry for the confusion
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Adendum to report filed earlier today

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on 350 hwy in raytown. 10:14 pm. with my windshield limiting my plane of view, a green white orb shape with faint halo around middle (like saturn's rings) rocketed towards the ground. probably 1 mile away from myself. it may have been approximately 20-30 ft in diameter. 1 second before impact with ground (assumed impact as horizon and darkness could not see or verify an impact with ground) the green white rings of  lights, with 1 green ring on top of 1 white ring, went dark and a small central to orb yellow light continued to ground. the orb had a greenish white trail as it descended, and there was a faint yellow trail after green white rings went dark and changed to small central round faint light. it happened within 2 seconds maybe. i immediately called my close friend scott who has shared his belief in ufo's with me. i have not claimed belief one way or the other. what i saw was not ordinary. i immediately thought "what the @$#! was that?!!" it was not normal. i have never seen something like that. i thought maybe a firework falling. but no firework shot up into the sky has ever fallen that fast back to the ground. it was probably moving 250 to 300 miles an hour at first until the green white lights went out. and when the yellow faint light dame on it appeared to have slowed significantly immediately before assumed impact or landing on ground. i would assume 80-100 mph.
content.summary: Descended rapidly, green white light orb light changed 1 second before impact to tiny yellow light

content.detailedDescription:
Coming back from work on north direction on monument blvd. i saw a perfect bow like formation concave from my point of view of 5 plus objects. at first i thought they were helicopters,but there was no blinking red and white lights, and no sound at all considering that they were flying lower than a helicopter. the orbs where flying below the speed of 50mph because i passed them shortly after, took a right and left at the t intersection and left to see them better, but only 2 reamined stationary, after being unable to record them i traveled south noticing 2 more orbs and then after those dissapeared flying ever slowly nw, 2 more showed up but this time they seemed to be vanished in front of me at aproximately a mile away. i heard 3 distinctive voices across from neighboors a woman one of them, the night was quiet and 80% clear, just a couple of couple of clouds.
after i recorded video same night of an open area from a park near by as comparison.
also recorded trajectory during the day, and several airplanes and helicopters, and no matter how far sound was audible
content.summary: Orange orbs concave arch formation

content.detailedDescription: My son and i watch the night sky and stare at the stars pretty much every night we can and tonight we were looking up and saw a bright light moving through the sky. we watched it for approx 10 mins until it disappeared over the horizon. i will note it was not a plane a plane at crazing altitude passed well underneath it. it also moved faster than the space station. we have seen that passover as well.  although this is not an exciting but it is still what we feel unidentified
content.summary: Looking at the stars and notice a very bright light as bright as venus move from an easto to west with no spinning like a satellite

content.detailedDescription:
There were 2 sightings of this "thing" on two separate nights. my brother was visiting and we were up late friday night 7/8/16 at my house. we went outside so that i could smoke a cigarette at around 1:30 a.M. he looked up at the sky and pointed out a strange glowing "thing". it was faintly changing color, pulsing, twinkling red and green, but predominantly golden yellow it was hovering over the trees to the west of our house. it was very low in the sky; much too low to be a star.  it hovered in one spot too long to be a helicopter. also, although we can see the planes to the south of us taking off and landing at the airport heading west or east, they stop around midnight - so it wasn't a plane - besides those planes fly much further south and don't hover.

my brother said it looked like a ufo, but i wasn't sure. like a good younger brother he reminded me that his eyesight is better than mine! we watched it for about 10 minutes or so and it didn't move at all.  we waved hello and thanked them for coming - being funny(but really hedging our bets!) and went inside. i have no ability to judge how far away it was, but it felt like it was hovering right above the streetlights not more than 500 ft away. there is a mountain/hill range that runs parallel to the road that sits above the walking trail on which we live. they are the blue diamond hills and begin 1.5 miles west of our house. i believe now it was probably over those hills, but i don't know if it was over the first range or further weston them and only desert vegetation. they are very stark. 

my brother left the following day. at about 10:15 pm saturday night 7/9/16, i went outside again to smoke a cigarette and looked south at the planes flying in and out of the airport. i also looked west for the "thing" but it wasn't in the sky. i texted my brother and told him i thought he might have been right, that it was a ufo we saw the night before. i told him that what we had seen in the sky the previous night  was significantly lower than the plane flight paths, and significantly further north - by miles.

i went outside again at 12:35 a.M. and there it was - in exactly the same spot in the sky as the night before. i texted my brother right away to tell him it was back, so i know the exact time i saw it. i got my husband to come out and look and he was pretty mystified as well. i decided to take some pictures with my cell phone. i didn't really think i would capture anything. my cell phone camera has a x8 zoom. i forgot my camera has a video recorder so i didn't take any videos. when i checked the photos i saw that the shape of the "thing" kept changing. my husband took a few close up photos with his cell phone, which also has x8 zoom. the ufo kept changing shape in his photos as well. he said we should go back in and just check a bit later to see if it was still there. we stayed outside for probably 10 minutes or so.

i went out maybe 10 minutes later, and it was a little higher in the sky, but not by much. i saw it slowly move just slightly north, stop, and keep moving slowly north again and then disappear behind the trees. this happened in just a few minutes i got my husband to come outside again and we kept looking for it through the trees at different spots in the yard. finally we saw it way out west, well past our immediate hills. it was flying west in a straight line and slowly disappeared. i was texting my brother the whole time because i was excited. when i checked the chain of my texts to my brother i saw that the whole sighting was 40 minutes long. i was shocked when i saw that because it didn't feel that long at all - it felt like maybe 20 minutes. i have not seen it again, although i look for it every night.

i downloaded the photos we took the following day. some of them i cropped to get a better idea of what it looked like close up. the first two photos are to show you the daytime shots from our yard to orient you. our yard and the park path on the other side sit below and run perpendicular to a main road. you can see the tops of the double headed street lights just above the far trees. the ear on the statue of the rabbit that's pointed up, is pointed directly at the ufo. the path has single headed lights. the ufo could be seen in the patch of sky between the two trees closest to our yard. in the photos the park lights are closer and white - the street lights look like huge orange spheres. in the shots without using the zoom, the ufo looks like a little white dot in the sky above the orange street lights. in real life it looked of course much bigger than in the pictures. it also looked much closer than it probably was. i'm not sure what we saw - but i guess that's why they're called unidentified flying objects.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a strange low hovering object in the sky on 7/8/16 and 7/9/16 in the exact same spot

content.detailedDescription:
There were 2 sightings of this "thing" on two separate nights. my brother was visiting and we were up late friday night 7/8/16 at my house. we went outside so that i could smoke a cigarette at around 1:30 a.M. he looked up at the sky and pointed out a strange glowing "thing". it was faintly changing color, pulsing, twinkling red and green, but predominantly golden yellow it was hovering over the trees to the west of our house. it was very low in the sky; much too low to be a star.  it hovered in one spot too long to be a helicopter. also, although we can see the planes to the south of us taking off and landing at the airport heading west or east, they stop around midnight - so it wasn't a plane - besides those planes fly much further south and don't hover.

my brother said it looked like a ufo, but i wasn't sure. like a good younger brother he reminded me that his eyesight is better than mine! we watched it for about 10 minutes or so and it didn't move at all.  we waved hello and thanked them for coming - being funny(but really hedging our bets!) and went inside. i have no ability to judge how far away it was, but it felt like it was hovering right above the streetlights not more than 500 ft away. there is a mountain/hill range that runs parallel to the road that sits above the walking trail on which we live. they are the blue diamond hills and begin 1.5 miles west of our house. i believe now it was probably over those hills, but i don't know if it was over the first range or further weston them and only desert vegetation. they are very stark. 

my brother left the following day. at about 10:15 pm saturday night 7/9/16, i went outside again to smoke a cigarette and looked south at the planes flying in and out of the airport. i also looked west for the "thing" but it wasn't in the sky. i texted my brother and told him i thought he might have been right, that it was a ufo we saw the night before. i told him that what we had seen in the sky the previous night  was significantly lower than the plane flight paths, and significantly further north - by miles.

i went outside again at 12:35 a.M. and there it was - in exactly the same spot in the sky as the night before. i texted my brother right away to tell him it was back, so i know the exact time i saw it. i got my husband to come out and look and he was pretty mystified as well. i decided to take some pictures with my cell phone. i didn't really think i would capture anything. my cell phone camera has a x8 zoom. i forgot my camera has a video recorder so i didn't take any videos. when i checked the photos i saw that the shape of the "thing" kept changing. my husband took a few close up photos with his cell phone, which also has x8 zoom. the ufo kept changing shape in his photos as well. he said we should go back in and just check a bit later to see if it was still there. we stayed outside for probably 10 minutes or so.

i went out maybe 10 minutes later, and it was a little higher in the sky, but not by much. i saw it slowly move just slightly north, stop, and keep moving slowly north again and then disappear behind the trees. this happened in just a few minutes i got my husband to come outside again and we kept looking for it through the trees at different spots in the yard. finally we saw it way out west, well past our immediate hills. it was flying west in a straight line and slowly disappeared. i was texting my brother the whole time because i was excited. when i checked the chain of my texts to my brother i saw that the whole sighting was 40 minutes long. i was shocked when i saw that because it didn't feel that long at all - it felt like maybe 20 minutes. i have not seen it again, although i look for it every night.

i downloaded the photos we took the following day. some of them i cropped to get a better idea of what it looked like close up. the first two photos are to show you the daytime shots from our yard to orient you. our yard and the park path on the other side sit below and run perpendicular to a main road. you can see the tops of the double headed street lights just above the far trees. the ear on the statue of the rabbit that's pointed up, is pointed directly at the ufo. the path has single headed lights. the ufo could be seen in the patch of sky between the two trees closest to our yard. in the photos the park lights are closer and white - the street lights look like huge orange spheres. in the shots without using the zoom, the ufo looks like a little white dot in the sky above the orange street lights. in real life it looked of course much bigger than in the pictures. it also looked much closer than it probably was. i'm not sure what we saw - but i guess that's why they're called unidentified flying objects.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a strange low hovering object in the sky on 7/8/16 and 7/9/16 in the exact same spot

content.detailedDescription:
I observed 5-7 objects in the sky while i was outside for a smoke break.  i had a sense they were ufo's  (i have had previous encounters with them).  the objects stayed in the same place.  i kept going outside to check on them.  when i went outside again around midnight they were gone.
i was alarmed. the sighting brought back fears i had from previous encounters.  after the birth of my 6th child, the medical doctors wanted to study my blood in order to research components of my blood that would be able to help other mothers with the length of time they were pregnant before delivery.  maybe the aliens are interested in my blood for the same reason.
content.summary: One large ship, surrounded by 5 smaller ships

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at home, i had decided to go outside and smoke a cigarette, as my son was home and i don't smoke inside when he is here.

2. i happened to be looking up at the stars as i often do

3. perhaps a star gone nova, or a star i hadn't noticed before

4. it was bright, changing colors between darken/redish/amber/golden to a brighter white/yellowish/golden color. every time i went inside to try to get somebody with a camera to answer, or tried to email mufon and went back outside it changed its location in the sky, and not by a small amount but by several miles at a time, until 2:10 when i came out and couldn't see it, i then decided i wasn't going back out there until 3 am when i couldn't resist the urge to see if it was still there, and i once again observed it in a different location until 3:38 when i checked the time and realized that since i couldn't figure out what it was and couldn't get anyone over to my house to confirm that i needed to go to be so as to be able to go to work in the morning. it was gone this morning when i awoke.

5. i was at first absolutely fascinated, then a bit frightened as each time i went inside and came back out it had moved such great distances yet while i was observing it seemed to hover in place. so i started to get the feeling it may be aware that i was observing it which then made me feel frightened, and i am rarely ever frightened by anything....Truly frightened that is. after words i felt disappointed that i had to give up and filming it and that i had to go to bed before it fully disappeared from view. but as i said before i had observed it for hours and i still couldn't make sense of it.

6. i didn't i finally decided to go to bed and to contact mufon in hopes that a logical explanation could be found, i will however the observing the sky tonight to see if it returns because that would give me great insight as to what it may be.
content.summary: It appeared in the sky, it was quite bright, at first i believe it may be a star gone nova perhaps until it changes places

content.detailedDescription: I lived on the beach in long beach ca, 9th floor, facing queen mary. im always taking pics out  my window, im in a wheelchair, but this day these big while bright marshmellows came from the sand up into sky, houvered then all of them followed each other and took of suddenly to the north. crazy butim not im telling you the truth and have lots more! please respond thank you
content.summary: I lived  on the beach they shot up from ground right out my window i face the queen mary ship in long beach

content.detailedDescription: I was stood on my back door step having a cigarette and just looking up into the night sky where i saw a dull red light travelleling slowly from west to east which i assumed was an aircraft untill it stopped dead, then after a few seconds it flew off at a greater speed in the direction from which it came. at first sighting it was a dull red, but when it sped off the colour changed to a dull orange and as its speed icreased, the colour changed to a dull yellow.
content.summary: Dull red light which rapidly changed directioni was stood on my back door step having a cigarette
